price: Mola wetu Mlezi! Tuondolee adhabu hii. Hakika tutaamini.
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: Kama pia watavyo sema kwa kuomba msamaha kwa Mwenyezi Mungu: Hakika sisi tutaamini ukituondolea adhabu ya njaa na dhiki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
